16 -class Ticker(Process): 

17 -    def tick(self): 

18          self.timing = [] 
19          while True: 
20              yield hold,self,1 
21              tSim = now() 
22              tRT = rtnow() 
23              self.timing.append((tSim,tRT)) 

24              
 
25  initialize() 
26  t=Ticker() 
27  activate(t,t.tick()) 
28  simulate(until=10,real_time=True,rel_speed=1) 
29  
 
30  print "Speed ratio set: 1" 
31  print "------------------" 
32  for tSim,tRT in t.timing: 
33      print "tSim:%s, tRT:%s, speed ratio:%s"%(tSim,tRT,tSim/tRT) 
34

36  t=Ticker()

39  
 
40  print
